Comments about this assessment:

Just like there are different teaching methods, people also learn in different ways. Mixing how content is presented to students can improve the learner engagement. In this assessment, we combine a mixture of text, equations, plots, videos, interactive JupyterLabs, and short quiz questions to introduce new course content to students. Read more here.
